main event: On March 13, 1961, a brilliant white circular object was observed by military personnel at Guard Island, exhibiting erratic movements and changing colors before disappearing.
interesting points: The object changed colors from brilliant white to light orange to a brilliant green-blue., The observation lasted approximately 30 seconds., The object was sighted at a slow velocity moving in a straight line., The sighting was reported via ground radar based on military observation., No sound was reported from the object.
